topic.title: Prepare: Get Started with HP Cloud OS

body.p: If you're new to HP Cloud OS, see these topics and the video tutorials to learn about the platform's functionality.

li.p: Release Notes - describes new features and recommendations. Read this document first.
HP Cloud OS Support Matrix for Hardware and Software - provides an overview of the supported hardware and software for the HP Cloud OS Sandbox, including information for hardware and software setup.
FAQs - answers to frequently asked questions about HP Cloud OS and related technologies.
Video Tutorials - These videos are perfect for anyone who prefers tutorial-style explanations of new functionality.
Technical Overview - helpful information to read before you install & configure HP Cloud OS and create your cloud.
Introduction to Cloud Types - covers the hybrid, private, and public clouds offered by HP.
Glossary - definitions of terms used in the HP Cloud OS components, user interfaces, and documentation.
